description: CBC Unique Identifier
Specific blood cell / component type
Datetime at which the test result was obtained
Value obtained for the specific component as a result of the test (coerced to Double)
Unique Patient Identifier
Name of location where patient was present
Datetime at which patient was logged as present in a specific location/section of the hospital.
Unique identifier for set of surgical procedures
Specific type of surgery to be carried out
Datetime of surgical operation
Datetime indicating when procedure was first scheduled
Indicator of whether surgery is “Elective” or “Urgent”
Donation Identification Number that uniquely identifies the group of units transfered
Code that uniquely identifies the product
Specific blood cell / component type being transfused. We focus on “PLT”
Datetime when component is transfused to patient
Unique identifier for product in inventory
The specific type of transfusable product (e.g. “PLT”)
Number of days after which unit is considered expired
Specific date on which unit is set to expire
Specific time on which unit is set to expire
